front.title: SCTP Overlay link for REsource LOcation And Discovery (RELOAD)

abstract.t: This document defines two new Overlay Link protocols to be used with REsource LOcation And Discovery (RELOAD), both using SCTP. The Overlay Link protocol DTLS-SCTP-NO-ICE uses DTLS on top of native SCTP for overlays that do not require the use of ICE. The Overlay Link protocol DTLS-SCTP-UDP uses DTLS on top of an UDP encapsulation of SCTP for overlays that require the use of ICE.
